snippet: Kate Kelly’s new job was in Manhattan but she lived in Philadelphia with her boyfriend, Nick Sabean. The couple decided to look for a one-bedroom in Manhattan.
abstract: The Hunt column on the search by Nick Sabean and Kate Kelly, looking to move from Philadelphia to New York City; couple found a one-bedroom rental in Manhattan for $1,350 a month.
lead_paragraph: Kate Kelly’s new job was in Manhattan but she lived in Philadelphia with her boyfriend, Nick Sabean. The couple decided to look for a one-bedroom in Manhattan.

headline.seo: The Hunt - Leaving Behind an Arduous Commute
